column1: New road construction and improvement: motorways and all purpose trunk roads: England: 2001/02-2011/121
1  Includes Design, Build, Finance and Operate (DBFO) schemes.
2  The Lane kms shown from 2010/11 includes new managed motorway schemes. This is not new build - this is new use of existing
lanes via the various  Managed Motorway methods (dynamic use of hard shoulder, all lane running, etc.).
The figures in this table are outside the scope of National Statistics
